name: Digital Marketing Executive
description:
Position Summary:

The Digital Marketing Executive together with Area Digital Marketing Director is responsible for execution of digital media according to developed strategy, related e-commerce activity and driving social strategy for Russia and CIS countries-based Hyatt Hotels, Restaurants, Spa & Fitness clubs.

Digital marketing efforts will include: search engine marketing (both paid and organic), mobile marketing, display advertising, e-mail marketing and assisting with social media planning and execution. This position will also oversee e-commerce activity including conducting management of hotels’ web sites and mini-sites.

Position Responsibilities / Essential Functions:

Digital and Social Marketing Responsibilities

  • Take part in development of annual communicational strategies for the hotels and their venues
  • Work with and manage agency to ensure PPC plans strategically and efficiently fit each individual hotel’s goals and objectives
  • Execute SEO best practices accordingly (both on and off site) to improve hotel visibility within search engines.
  • Measure and report to hotels performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals on monthly basis
  • Evaluate market conditions and competitor data.

E-Commerce Responsibilities

  • Exhibit knowledge of CPA, CPC, CPM, e-mail buys, paid search, mobile and other conventional and unconventional internet advertising/acquisition models
  • Work closely with Marketing Communications Managers to ensure hotels’/restaurants’/spa & fitness websites are relevant, up to date and optimized
  • Implement e-commerce tactics and best practices for the hotel web site such as content management and traffic driving tools
  • Work with agency to ensure strategies adopted for each hotel and no business-related conflicts (i.e. bidding on same keywords, etc.)

Requirements

  • Fluent English
  • Multitasking
  • Passion for structuring data and processes
  • Perfect communication skills
  • 1-3-year experience in digital marketing
  • Working with SERP marketing tools, social media and display advertising campaigns
  • Knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics)
  • Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement
  • Full day, non-remote work, 5/2
